website_summaries.verdict: With an i7 processor, 16 gigabytes of RAM and 256-gigabyte SSD Drive, the Predator packs a punch.
pros: This is a gamer's laptop that doesn't scream "gamer's laptop"
The red keyboard backlighting is understated
If you want to add a second SSD or HDD drive, mounting ware is included
cons: Graphics are passable if you're not doing photography or design work

website_summaries.verdict: Unique, portable VR-capable computer rig to experience unique worlds anywhere you want.
pros: laptop comes with upgrade GTX 1060 graphics card for better VR results
Metal construction makes the laptop more durable than typical options
cons: Can run extremely hot when playing games or using VR programs

customer_reviews.title: For over $1,000.00 this computer should work over 2months. Customer support is terrible
customer_reviews.text: It was great in the 2 months it worked. Now the screen goes black all of the sudden when he’s using it and Acer will do nothing to replace it. I think that after spending over $1,000.00 on this computer it should have lasted more than 2 months. I bought it for my son who was leaving for Kuwait in the Air Force He went to Kuwait and is now starting classes on line while he’s there but now has no computer. The customer service woman could have cared less. He is shipping the computer back to me but I’m not sure what to do with it since acer is not standing behind their product and doesn’t want it back
customer_reviews.author: K. Wales

customer_reviews.title: Compatible with Oculus Rift and a way to get more usb 3.0 ports.....
customer_reviews.text: Laptop works great for Virtual Reality with the latest Oculus Rift CV1 and $399 touch bundle. Here's a tip for those worried about not enough usb 3.0 ports on the laptop for oculus users : To have the best oculus performance which requires 3 qty usb 3.0 ports, use the laptop's left side usb (3.0) for the oculus headset and then buy this: "AmazonBasics USB 3.1 Type-C to 4 Port USB Hub". This will allow you to convert the laptop's left side usb c (3.1) port to usb 3.0 ports power the rift's 2 usb sensors at usb 3.0 bandwidth speeds.
customer_reviews.author: bravebluerx

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable.
customer_reviews.text: The laptop was out of the box for two weeks before the GPU failed. Support was OK, but a hardware repair would take seven to ten days turnaround, and no guarantee that the problem wouldn't happen again. Easier to wipe it, and send it back to Amazon for a refund, and get something better. My reccomendation is to avoid this particular machine. It is built well, and was snappy while it lasted, but failing after two weeks has certainly made me decide that Acer is on my Do Not Buy list.
customer_reviews.author: LeFinn

customer_reviews.title: Overall bad quality.  Acer lost my laptop after I sent it in for repair.
customer_reviews.text: Laptop would not power on after less than 10 months of light use. After sending to Acer for repair, they sent an empty box back to me. Luckily the FedEx agent was there when I opened the door. I commented that the box felt too light. We both took pictures of the package and then the agent verified that there was indeed nothing inside the package. Acer told me that I would have to file a claim. I did, and have not heard back from them since. The additional insurance I purchased is now pretty much useless since the laptop is gone. Terrible experience. Stay away from Acer.
customer_reviews.author: R C.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Gaming rig that will play anything on Ultra
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic gaming rig. It will play any game on ultra settings without issue. (Witcher 3, Doom, CoD WW2, Hellblade, Dark Souls 3, etc.) Very solid construction, and it feels high quality. I have had it for 6-7 months and I love it. I have travelled around the world with it 3 times now and it still works flawlessly. Restarts in about 10 second fully ready to go. I highly recommend this laptop. It not just a great value for a 1060, but great in every way. I added a 2TB SSHD to it very easily. It blutooths to my xbox controller without messing with any settings. You wont find a better laptop for anywhere near the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Smith

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed after a year now
customer_reviews.text: So it has been around a year now of me owning this laptop and I have had some annoying problems. Every now and then the laptop freezes and shuts down to only power back up on a frozen login screen. The only way to get around this is fully shutting down the computer holding the power button and wait for it to power on again. Also, I get a black screen a lot in the middle of just browsing the internet and the same case has to be done to get the laptop back to its working self again. I think this is a major flaw especially after all the money I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Awesome computer, great portable gaming laptop. Earned all 5 stars easily
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Everything I throw at it gets chewed up and spit back out. I run high graphics, while recording and streaming, and I get no hiccups. Definitely work the money. Only problem I had was it only came with a 250SSD that filled up in a literal instant. Had to get a 4TB external drive to put all my videos and games on, but that was only $100 and not really a big inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Warning: missing parts make adding 2nd HD impossible.
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: Missing drive parts arrived today, one week after purchase. Changing review to 5 stars because outside of that, the machine performs flawlessly and is exactly what I wanted. The machine came without an internal HD caddy, SATA cable, and screws. Acer support informed me those parts are out of stock and there's no ETA. The support person helpfully told me that I should check in with them "once a week" to see if they got the parts. Great, so now I'm supposed to chase them down for how ever many weeks it takes? I am unable to use my laptop for its intended purpose because the existing HD is too small.
customer_reviews.author: BlackBellamy

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.... Next.
customer_reviews.text: When you purchase a product at this price, it should work. Not this flimsy Preditor laptop. Sure it had a great screen and cool look but when the WiFi dosen't work even after having to use the ethernet to go to the ACER web page in order to down load the WiFi driver and the laptop still doesn't work, that is truely infuriating. And then "Bob" from support says you can mail it into ACER tech support to get it fixed? Nah. I want my money back and will look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: P. S.

customer_reviews.title: Beast!!
customer_reviews.text: If u buying this laptop from USA to India, than go ahead .. u will save nearly 50 to 60k and have this beast. 5 star performer !! Got the product within 10 days and you will be notified on each movement of this laptop and no problem in customs as AmazonGlobal take care everything:)
customer_reviews.author: amoghg=

customer_reviews.title: This machine delivers!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this laptop. It's so fast and is so good at operating video conferencing. I got it to run my live stream using OBS. I will test that out next and get back to you on that. I'm not a gamer but I have live streamed for nearly 5 years. Having a computer that runs multiple cameras, headset, live stream broadcasting and a video call all at the same time...that's what I was hoping for and this one delivers!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather at the Kraaft Shaak

customer_reviews.title: Many keys do not work
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and several of the keys don't work. (a,x,c,t,1,3 etc.) It is impossible to set it up to anything, such as my wifi since i can't type in the password. Will try to contact Acer to get a new one. Disappointed, I was really looking forward to the laptop; it seemed like a really good one. Will update if i can get it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful and affordable
customer_reviews.text: With amazon’s easy payment plan option (5 equal payments over 5 months) it made the purchase of this powerful laptop a reality. Not only did this gaming machine meet all of our expectations but the wonderful option of being able to make payment over time was well... Almost to good to be true! Only complaint was we payed for next day delivery and it didn’t arrive as promised, but a call to customer service got us a refund of our next day fee and 1 month free Amazon subscription (I currently pay $12.99 a month)
customer_reviews.author: Ron K.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Unable to keep. Computer kept shutting itself off. Tech support was unable to fix the issue. Reviews for Acer over the last year exhibit that this is not a new problem- yet Acer continues to sell these faulty devices.
customer_reviews.author: S Graeter

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY IF YOU'RE A POWER USER
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst computers I've ever used. For some reason you cannot disable the Intel integrated graphics, it overrides GTX1060 on certain programs, even if you set the proper settings in Nvidia Control Panel. The only work around is using an external monitor, which then uses the 1060, but this completely defeats the purpose of buying a powerful LAPTOP. *EDIT* 2/19/2019 Now the laptop is practically bricked. I've tried rolling back drivers, resetting the computer all the way back to factory defaults, and still, it's wildly underperforming. Now I have to RMA this POS and wait, when I could be working. (See Attached Image)
customer_reviews.author: notsure

customer_reviews.title: Defective right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: It was defective right out of the box. Something is wrong with the hardware, probably the sound card -- the sound keeps cutting out. Amazon support talked us through attempting to re-install the sound driver, but no joy. It was an incredibly disappointing birthday for my son, who had worked hard for a year to earn this computer. I feel this is something quality control absolutely should have found -- the first sentence Cortana spoke was unintelligible. Amazon was very nice about facilitating the return. Hoping the next one is better quality. If my son hadn't chosen this one after a lot of research, I would probably be replacing with a different product.
customer_reviews.author: dr.girlfriend

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of crap! Search for better options...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of crap! The computer started misbehaving after less than 1 year of usage.... I have sent it back to customer services twice now already under warranty but they still have not fixed the problem! I rate them 1 star.... It doesn't even run as fast a computer with GPU should run, and mind you, it has 16GB ram and 6GB GPU. So disappointed for wasting my money on this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Landry KEZEBOU

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, poor customer support
customer_reviews.text: CPU fan started dying after less than a year. The GPU used in this laptop is pretty borderline so the cooling is critical. Acer says that the CPU fan is an item they cannot ship out, which means you are required to literally ship the laptop to them just to replace a fan. I wouldn't be so bothered by that if I could pull the hard drive and just ship it to them like that, but they want you to ship it with the hard drive installed. Totally unacceptable. Avoid this product and this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: So far this has been a great computer runs every game I've tried to play on ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great computer runs every game I've tried to play on it ..and for the Linux fans you can install Linux on it ( I dual boot with Kali)..for the money its a great computer very fast even the wi-fi card is fast.. i'm impressed so far, i thought it would be bulkier then it is but its very portable as well
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Solid laptop meant for gaming but handles CAD and 3D apps like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: Just checking in after owning for a year. Laptop runs strong, is fast, and no real problems. Mainly use for work and connected to a 4K monitor but performance is exceptional. The 1060 runs CAD and 3D modeling programs well and is stable. Only gripe is I wish the USB 3.o was thunderbolt.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Best of show!
customer_reviews.text: Just had this for a couple days and so far I've reloaded windows three times. I was determined to run an older game controller(Nostromo N52) and my best game (The Division) and was getting errors that ended up getting fixed with research online and had to add DLL files TechUtilities_setup_1.9.3 did the trick. So now this beautiful laptop runs great, quiet with over an hour last night no problems full bore into the game. Very well packaged and what you get inside is well worth the money spent. Hard to find a better deal for the quality you receive. I mean very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Bourgoin

customer_reviews.title: so good. I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I'm very happy with it. Heating is of course a problem when doing heavy gaming, but that's an issue universal to all gaming laptops currently. It actually handles it quite well so far, and I've never had to stop to let it cool, or buy a cooling pad- though I'm not doing anything too over the top with it. When I received it, I immediately cleared the hard drive and reinstalled windows as I wanted it, to ensure I didn't have to deal with any pre-loaded crap software, and since then it's been great. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop!
customer_reviews.text: We shopped around without a lot of knowledge about good gaming laptops. We compared so many on Amazon. This is one fantastic unit! Son uses it every day. It is sturdy, user friendly, not too heavy, and the case is hard so it protects. I love the red lights under the keys so you can use it at night without any trouble. Excellent for gaming, but I am borrowing it today to write these reviews as my laptop is awaiting a new charger. I really love it. I think it was a great price, too. We also got the extended warrantee. Highly recommend this for gaming, or for any use!
customer_reviews.author: Writer

customer_reviews.title: Good Machine
customer_reviews.text: I've had it a week, and so far so good. The only thing I would definitely suggest getting a second hard drive. I will most likely update as things progress, but it definitely works well at high resolutions without overheat issues so far. Updated: About a month now. The second hard drive installed and all games are on the machine, every one of them is running at Ultra settings without issue. This is my first laptop that uses the dual GUI setup and I like the idea. No issues everything works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Davis

customer_reviews.title: Best $1100 Laptop I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of the best laptops for around $1000. I, have only owned this laptop for about a week, but I'm loving it. It can play anything I throw at it. It runs GTA 5 on high graphics just fine and Battlefield 1 on max just fine(Have not looked at exact fps but would say at least low 50's if not 60's). All in all, I love it and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Sangui

customer_reviews.title: PUBG machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine for one purpose: to play Battlegrounds / PUBG on the road. I'm in a hotel 5 nights every week and this thing plays PUBG on Ultra for around a grand, what more do you want? 1060 with 6gb is the key here. You can't find another laptop with these specs in this price range. Build quality is about what I expect from an Acer with a few nice touches. I would not consider it a rugged laptop, but it's on the road with me constantly and I haven't had any issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: For the cost of this computer it should be of better quality.
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this computer. !!!!! 1 month after receiving this computer the hard drive crashed. I had to send it in for repair, paying shipping costs. 6 months after, a key broke on the keyboard and they want me to send it in for repair requiring more shipping costs. For the cost of this computer it should be of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming Laptop for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is my first "real" performance/gaming laptop. Everything is very responsive and I haven't reached a limit to what it can do yet. My games of choice are GTA 5 and StarCraft II. I dual boot the preinstalled Windows 10 OS and Ubuntu 18.04. A tip with Ubuntu... disable the sleep/hibernate option or else it'll randomly lockup. The only down side I can think of is it doesn't have the hard drive status light to quickly monitor how busy the computer is, but since it's using a SSD, I see why they don't have it. Based off of the specs of this mobile command post, I don't think I'll need to upgrade for a while.
customer_reviews.author: theskyman

customer_reviews.title: Seems as if things go wrong with this laptop very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item on November 27, 2017. Thus far, I have sent this product in twice for repairs in addition for a replacement of the charger unit due to defects. It is not a bad laptop when it works, but it gets super hot towards the keyboard which it reaches approximately 100C. Currently having an issue due to the hinge of the laptop breaking which due to a physical break is $619.99 (Over half of the laptop's cost). Super rough. Not sure if I would recommend this product. The speakers are really good quality though and it is nice to watch Netflix during study breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Flyinpanda

customer_reviews.title: Owned for 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I really like this laptop its a little heavy to carry back and forth from school but it's an excellent computer speed and performance wise. Its built really well and the fans are very quiet the battery could be better but overall I'm super happy. I use this mostly for school and a little gaming on the side. The only other feature I would like on this is that the backlight could be brightened and/or dimmed and different color options what is just a cool selling feature to me. Sometimes the speakers get crackly but I'm not sure if the speakers or just the music/game/movie I am watching.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Runs hot, but runs everything with ease
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop so I could play VR games with the oculus rift. I've had it for a few months, and it's been great! haven't found a game yet that ran slow. I enjoy the portability since I travel a lot. Price is good for the amount of power you get. I would give 4.5 stars if I could though. the thing does heat up quite a bit. and there's very little internal storage on this laptop to store games, so I ran out of space after installing like 4 bigger games on it. No biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Morto422

customer_reviews.title: Amazing PC i love it !
customer_reviews.text: Amazing computer !!! i love it , im been plying Rising of Tomb Rider , with the highest Quality of graphics and im getting more than 60 FPS and the temperature is around ( 70C on the GPU ) and ( 70C to 80C on the CPU ) after 3 to 4 hours of gaming and i didnt under volt the CPU yet !! the only think that this pc is missing is the thunderbolt to connect and external GPU but after that is an amazing pc for the price !
customer_reviews.author: GTDrone

customer_reviews.title: It's worked very well.
customer_reviews.text: It has served it's purpose very well. Presently, it has more resources than necessary. It's overkill. It's handled any task thrown at it with ease. It's served as a desktop replacement, remaining in one area at home. It's used for light gaming, browsing, and watching streaming videos. It remains relatively cool under this relatively light load. I have yet to experience an issue with the hardware or operating system (Win10). The price is slightly higher than what I wanted to pay. However, I am still satisfied with the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper1

customer_reviews.title: Good on paper, terrible in practice.
customer_reviews.text: The laptop came through an error 0xc000001 within 5 days. I switched it thanks to Amazon, and within one month, the new one now crashes all the time, goes through blue screens often, has a trackpad that doesn't work, and these issues appear after making many updates of the drivers, taking great care of the laptop, and going through a soft and a hard reset. I can accept issues randomly happening once, not twice.
customer_reviews.author: Allain Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Mine arrived with the drive mounting kit prenstalled.
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted people to know Mine came with the Sata cable and HD Mount installed, I ordered the Laptop with HD bundle and did not have to send for the drive kit. This laptop is as fast as my I7 4790k 32Gb DDR3 DESKTOP that I built 2 years ago, It remains a cool 35c with an Ambient of 80F @ idle, I have not seen temps over 71c @ load while using a second monitor while playing a Game.
customer_reviews.author: DeltaTech

customer_reviews.title: Best hardware for this price range, hands down
customer_reviews.text: Best hardware for this price range, hands down. A GTX 1060 and a 7700HQ at about $1000 is hard to beat. The only thing that seems to be compromised is its cooling solutions, so I would recommend investing in a laptop cooler that has a fan at the intake. It took a bit of effort to get the GPU drivers to install properly, but after that, it has worked flawlessly. There have been a few firmware updates since I purchased it, so that might not even be problem anymore. I bought this for my college classes and for gaming and it has handled both with ease, sometimes even at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: No no no, mine mine mine.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Mine came with the HDD upgrade kit. Had issues with damage during shipment but amazon was quick to resolve the issue. The laptop runs a bit hot but not enough to cause discomfort when actually using it on your lap. It's a very powerful machine for this price. I was able to run FFXIV on maximum settings and never drop below 60 fps. At this price point I'd be willing to buy a second for my kids. I originally bought this for them, however durring setup and application testing. I realized this was meant for me. xD
customer_reviews.author: 8bithero

customer_reviews.title: Penny Smart - Dollar Stupid - need to ask for the HDD wiring
customer_reviews.text: Nice deal. I would give it higher score if ACER was not "penny smart - dollar stupid" . They did not put the wiring and brackets for the HDD, so, I had to contact them and ask for it. Saved $0.55 on manufacturing, cost them $$$ on dealing with customer support and shipping.
customer_reviews.author: da

customer_reviews.title: Pay 85 dollars to return a 1100 dollar Laptop for repair 6 months after purchase
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed that a laptop purchased as a backup for if my main PC went down as well as the rare times that I travel would go out 6 months after purchase when it has never left my room. One of the few times I went to use it, found it dead. While Acer sent a free power cord to test for fault in the cord, that turned out not to be the issue, so had to pay 85 dollars to ship and insure the package to return an 1,100 dollar computer to be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Was good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: Screen is a little dark. Great graphics performance. However, part of the mechanism when opening the laptop is flimsy. Not sure if it's the hinge or what, but I've read online of multiple people having the exact same problem. This laptop doesn't seem to be built to last, but seems to be a nice budget laptop that if you're lucky will last a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Ess Doordin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome laptop for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is great for the money, the only thing that I would like is a little better screen but it is not bad at all. Add in the fact I was able to add a Seagate 2TB FireCuda for storage and games it is great! The only issue I had was that my laptop did not come with the caddy for the extra hdd but I got one shipped to me for free by talking to Acer's customer service and explaining the issue. It even states on their website that you may have to contact them to get one. Seagate 2TB FireCuda Gaming SSHD SATA 6Gb/s 64MB Cache 2.5-Inch Hard Drive (ST2000LX001)
customer_reviews.author: alexander

customer_reviews.title: It works and there is some blacklight bleed but I knew that going in so far did a fresh install and I haven't rushed to return it which im glad for because I have been hunting for so long
customer_reviews.text: So far it has beaten out a predator 17, and 15. Also beating out a MSI GT73VR. It works and there is some blacklight bleed but I knew that going in so far did a fresh install and I haven't rushed to return it which im glad for because I have been hunting for so long. the temps are okay I don't feel an urge to repaste it unlike the predator 17/15 which had bubble gum for thermal paste. I did get the screws for the extra HDD/SSD 2.5 drive bay but I will update further if I return this or run into any issues!
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Annoying problems
customer_reviews.text: I had problems with the laptop and just returned it. It seems the screen could have been loose because every time I adjusted the screen it would turn off. I also had problems with the cursor jumping with videos or games running. It was not a wireless mouse either and was super annoying. Had the laptop for less then a week.
customer_reviews.author: Kei

customer_reviews.title: Big fan
customer_reviews.text: I did read the 1* reviews before buying this laptop, but I have been pleasantly surprised not to have encountered any of the issues listed there. I made two changes from stock: I had them double the memory at the factory, and I ordered and installed a Seagate 2TB SSD HD after it arrived. I couldn't be happier. It runs my games on Ultra just fine. Boots up quicker than any PC I've ever had
customer_reviews.author: Chimeric

customer_reviews.title: Specs for the price can't be beat
customer_reviews.text: Getting a lot of computer at a low price. Spent few weeks looking for a good laptop with relatively good specs under $1k and this beats everything else I found. Having used this for weeks now I love this laptop. Interesting note is when not gaming or using any editing software it uses the Intel graphics. It will automatically switch to the 1060 when game is detected. And this card runs great. Screen does seem bit darker than most screens of previous laptops I have used, but not a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: FilmCamDan718

customer_reviews.title: Quality is Slightly Below Pricepoint
customer_reviews.text: The functionality of the laptop is great aside from occasional/intermittent/unpredictable lag while streaming movies and, rarely, during gaming. For the price point, I expected better performance. Lighting at the top of the and behind screen is very apparent, not uniformly lit. Average quality overall. Startup is extremely fast but then performance is sluggish for first 2-3 minutes of use. The case and hinges are not as durable as advertised as I feel I must be very careful when opening or closing from one side of the screen; rather it must be opened from the center near the webcam. Webcam quality is poor. More USB ports would have been preferred.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S.

customer_reviews.title: It runs HOT!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Software seems fine, although I would much rather use Windows 7 still. Its big issue, for me, is heat. It has a consistent and annoying problem of holding so much heat that I cannot use the keyboard on the laptop. It is also causing issues with it locking up and having to shut it down by holding the power button down, letting it cool, and then starting it back up. I even have a cooling pad underneath it, to push air to the bottom. While I honestly like the computer, the heat issue causes me to not recommend this for anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good value, maybe the best value option for $1k laptop!
customer_reviews.text: A great bargain! IF you don't mind the over-the-top red accents, this is super value. The laptop is decently portable, not too large or thick, and stay pretty cool when not gaming. When gaming things can get loud, but performance is really quite good. I was able to play several games at 1080p on high if I turned down Shadows and some of the post-process features. Games that worked well: The Division, FarCry 4, KC:D
customer_reviews.author: R.Baker

customer_reviews.title: It looks quite nice and powerful for a $1000 gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: It looks quite nice and powerful for a $1000 gaming laptop. However, the 2nd place to install the SSD/HDD drive is missing a hard drive caddy and SATA connector. for those who is going to buy this laptop should prefer a Bigger STORAGE then they can install everything for you. It is a fail for me to buy this Powerful laptop with a limited storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A steal at this price
customer_reviews.text: It's a ridiculous deal at this price, with the NVidia card and a i7 chip. I picked up a 2 TB hard drive and 32 meg of memory, and replaced my aging ROG. Loved the ROG, but with it winding down, I decided to put more money into a desktop in preparation for VR, but still wanted something to take on the road that could still handle my favorite games. Feels weird not having a optical drive, but that's the way of things nowadays. Buy it. Note: This review is for the product, and not the criminally bad job Amazon did in packaging it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Defective
customer_reviews.text: Well. It looks awesome. However, as it does not turn on it is rather useless and beyond worthless. Needless to say I followed the instructions, tested the outlet, tried different outlets, checked connections, tried leaving it plugged in for awhile before re-trying and so on. Nope. Very expensive paper weight. Instant return. People were right about it showing smudges and attracting oil although this seems really like a small problem considering.
customer_reviews.author: Yaira Kurtzman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing laptop
customer_reviews.text: well what can I see I got what I purchased, I even got the HD connector and the chaddy. I had no problems with the screen nor did I have any heating problems so far. all I did was update the bios. I have tested a COD game. still didn't have the heating issue as I said updated: laptop gets heated after abot 3hrs of gaming and it sometimes makes pressing the keys uncomfortable. the skin is very dimmed so if you are expecting a hella brightness his aint the laptop also i dont mind it because too much glare can affect you vision. also the battery lasted around 30mins unpluged while playing game. 11/24/2017
customer_reviews.author: levar

customer_reviews.title: Favorite PC yet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Summer of 2018 for a new gaming heavy PC. So far it's been working incredible. I haven't been experiencing any lag or issues with the graphics and gameplay. I added a 1tb HDD for space and storage and have been having a great time enjoying this for online or offline play. The speakers and other sound ports are phenomenal. I enjoying having a machine I can easily takes to a friend's for events or just convenience. Movies have never looked better on this HD screen.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah

customer_reviews.title: Generally great all around
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the greatest gaming laptop for the buck. It took me a while researching the right gaming laptop for the right price but this one takes the cake. It runs games like the Witcher 3 at high settings. The keys are lit up perfectly and you can change the lighting to brighter or darker. The keys feels smooth to the touch when you press on them giving off little to no noise. I bought a skin decal so it wouldn’t get riddled with fingerprints or scratches. It’s a very responsive laptop that allows room for a secondary slot to insert another ssd or hard drive. I would recommend getting this.
customer_reviews.author: Ferruccio

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy this laptop. First laptop I ever bought. Only thing I did was install a second hard drive right away. Had my old 500gb out of my PlayStation. It’s a lot nicer to install and remove game off this hard drive then the factory one. I always have it plug in so I hardly use the battery. Still going strong after a year and half.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Woodin

customer_reviews.title: but Acer seems to be retarted enough to not include essential components in this Predator Helios 300 G-571 i contacted the support and they simply can't shipp these missing part so good luck.
customer_reviews.text: HDD Cable and Caddy are missing, I ordered this laptop from France, but Acer seems to be retarted enough to not include essential components in this Predator Helios 300 G-571 i contacted the support and they simply can't shipp these missing part so good luck.... i will try to contact Acer France but i'm not sure if they have the missing hdd cable and hdd caddy Acer is such a bad company in therm of fiability very very disapointed
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Missing the Sata cable and the caddy
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get the caddy or the sata cable !! and now to install the sata cable i have to perform almost full disassembly
customer_reviews.author: Abdulaziz Alhusni

customer_reviews.title: If I could I would give it 10 stars!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything that I had imagined, plays everything flawlessly most new games like paragon or overwatch in high to epic graphics, I do use a cooling pad to keep it at a managable tenpature,although it's only been about a month or so. I will update if things change.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Allen

customer_reviews.title: Suddenly died 5 months later- will update
customer_reviews.text: Bought this laptop in July of 2018 - it suddenly died today while my fiance was playing Overwatch. It was connected to power adaptor and the battery reset so far hasn't worked. We've opened a ticket with customer support and they will send us a shipping label. I'm not sure if common with this model...but thought I'd throw it out there. I will update review on what happens after it's looked at by a Acer tech. Luckily it does look like this model comes with a 2 year warranty. However, I regret not also buying a SquareTrade warranty for this as well. I would recommend getting that.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Louisa Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Early problems
customer_reviews.text: I bought the laptop for less than 1 year.. and i already have major On and Off switch problems. During several instances, my laptop just blackout and i cant turn it on for no reason. The laptop is plugged in and no visible damage..i guess there are some internal problems.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Zhang

customer_reviews.title: ACER PREDATOR HELIOS 300 FINAL REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: Since i got this laptop 2 weeks ago, I have been using this computer 8 hrs. a day for two weeks atleast. On my intended use for the laptop as my main video editing computer (4k Files), browser and slight gaming rig. This is my final review of the Acer Predator Helios 300.
customer_reviews.author: ko-ko-ro-ko

customer_reviews.title: Afordable and powerful laptop
customer_reviews.text: Amazing laptop! I bought an extra 1TB M2 HD and upgraded the RAM to 32GB. Now it has all the power I'll ever need hehe.
customer_reviews.author: Werner Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Overall gaming performance has been great for games such as pubg and rainbow six siege ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this laptop for around a month now for not only gaming but editing within premiere pro and lightroom and have to say, it's held up quite well. It's worth mentioning that i've used it mostly in a docked format where i have it hooked up to a separate monitor, mouse and keyboard so i can't comment much on battery life or keyboard comfort. Overall gaming performance has been great for games such as pubg and rainbow six siege that i play regularly and also I haven't ran into any of the temperature issues others have mentioned so prolonged sessions haven't been an issue as i normally play for 4-6 hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: C R

customer_reviews.title: Ah-may-zing!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is sick! I heard a lot of negatives and yea maybe some of them were more or less true, but none of them were deal breakers for me. Yes, the brightness is a little weak and the sound isn't thaaat great either, but the performance is crazy good! Believe me, I checked like crazy for something better than this in this price range and I've watched way too many videos as well, this laptop is what you should go for. 4 stars because of the screen brightness, audio and because it's a fingerprint magnet :( But it's still great!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Barretto

customer_reviews.title: Seem's to be getting worse every time you move the screen or close and ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not impressed with the screen bleeding and no its not IPS Glow... Seem's to be getting worse every time you move the screen or close and open it i'm sending mine back getting a new one...If it has screen bleed too i'm done with this model as i do not have the money or time to keep dinking around with shipping/returning i am kinda starting to feel acer might of really gone too cheap on the display's on this model....
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: First one had issues
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the original one - keyboard got so hot that it burned my son's fingers. We had bought a cooling pad for it as well the first week (when we first noticed the keyboard got warm.) Problem just escalated/keyboard continued to get hotter every day - regardless. New one arrived and so far so good. We will continue to monitor.
customer_reviews.author: adam potash

customer_reviews.title: It's still a great deal. There is simply not a laptop that ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this laptop for about 6 months now. I cannot complain. It's still a great deal. There is simply not a laptop that gives better gaming performance at tis price. I've also had absolutely no problems with the computer. It runs everything great and has been a great home computer as well as gaming machine. Again, the five star rating is based on value for the price. There are a few little things about this computer that could have been better. The screen is not the best and it does not support V-Sync. Also, the battery life is pretty short, it's not really that great for cordless gaming, but most laptops are not.
customer_reviews.author: Simple, yet complicated.

customer_reviews.title: Gaming laptops have a bad reputation, but it's great
customer_reviews.text: Can run anything at high and always gets over 60 fps. My only problems are 1. Poor battery life 2. Poor storage If you just want a gaming pc that you don't want to move around too much, then get a prebuilt desktop for the same price or build your own, but if you want an great pc that you can take anywhere I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Schaal

customer_reviews.title: I love this laptop
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop! I was afraid to get it at first because of some of the horror stories. I've used it for 6 months now and its very powerful. I added a HDD, but since the laptop didn't come with a SATA connector I had to contact ACER. I used the online chat help and they sent me a SATA connector for free and it arrived in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Pape

customer_reviews.title: Extremely high GPU and CPU temperature
customer_reviews.text: the issue is when I play games in high settings with 60fps the GPU (GTX 1060 6GB) gets up to 93 °C even 100°C (sometimes). this turn the laptop so hot and it affects the laptop inside components. I tried everything for the past 1 year and 5 months to fix this problem but nothing helped. I play the games in 30fps which is not fun at all. even with 30fps, the temperature for both CPU and GPU get high. I am sorry I will not give any star for gaming rating. because this laptop should run the game in 60fps with fine stable temperature after all its called gaming laptop but its not for me (disappointed).
customer_reviews.author: mahmoud

customer_reviews.title: Owned since release. Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this computer. I've seen some poor reviews, and don't understand them. I've had it since it was released, and have been very impressed. One of my favorite features is Predator Sense. I crank those fan settings to max and game away. It's also really cool to see timeline of how hot the CUP and GPU are and at what capacity they are running while gaming. Games I've played on Ultra: - Conan Exiles - Playerunknowns Battleground - COD IW - Battlefield 3 & 1 - Minecraft ;) I'm willing to bet that this machine will chew up any game thrown at it...
customer_reviews.author: Brett and Amanda Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong product
customer_reviews.text: The tape on the box that the laptop was in was cut opened. After taking the laptop out, I realize the laptop says Gateway instead of Predator, and it looks nothing like the Acer Predator laptop. It also didn't contain any battery or charger along with it. I'm very disappointed that this has happened for an expensive item. -After doing a little research, the laptop I received is a Gateway NV Series.
customer_reviews.author: j_chan729

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful for the price
customer_reviews.text: The graphics, speed, and easy of adding a second hard drive (open port with easy access and explicit instructions on how to do it) make this a top choice. Please note, you may have to configure the system to explicitly use the GTX video card for the apps that require it (there are two video subsystems, the nVidea and an Intel), and you have to have the power plugged in to use the GTX (at least for VR). Battery life isn't stellar, but I didn't buy this for road warrior action, I bought it for portable VR (and it does it VERY WELL).
customer_reviews.author: JDavidX

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: What can I say it gets the job done. I can play No Man's Sky on full blast no problem. Cons: heavy, low battery life (which doesn't matter to me I bring the power cord everywhere), gets hot to the point to where it becomes uncomfortable to the touch when running things on "full blast." They cut corners on the screen to cut the costs down. It is very obvious. It could be much brighter and the images could be much sharper. When I plug it into my 50 inch downstairs it's wonderful though :) I have no regrets buying this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: ... worried when ordering that the laptop would have some poor build quality and that it would run too hot
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when ordering that the laptop would have some poor build quality and that it would run too hot. Fortunately mine is very nice for the money you are spending. The screen quality is solid but amazing but does what it needs to. I spent 5 hours straight playing pubg last night and the cpu and gpu never went over 65.Mine also came with the 2nd hard drive screws and hardware and also let me upgrade straight from 1.10 to 1.3. So far so good, if something somehow goes south I will update but for now I'd say this thing is worth the price easily.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Salanik

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it is Fantastic. You can't beat the price for a "Budget" ...
customer_reviews.text: The only negative I can give this laptop is that it didn't come with the bracket for a 2nd hard drive. Acer did ship me the kit free of charge and I received it within a week but it was an annoyance as I had purchased a 2nd hard drive in expectation of the laptops arrival. Other than that it is Fantastic. You can't beat the price for a "Budget" gaming laptop. And I've had no problems with the screen which was the only negative feedback I'd heard prior to my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Best hardware for the price range
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very satisfied with this laptop. It has everything that I looked for. Having 7th gen i7 cpu and gtx 1060 6 gb gpu together is unmatched for the price. Build quality is better than I expected, sound quality is good and heat management is also nice. It has IPS screen that is a little bit dim and it has a relatively small battery but these won't bother me much. I stronly recommend this if you want great hardware (cpu , gpu) with 1000 $ price range.
customer_reviews.author: Emre

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This computer is just perfect. It works better than what I expected and aesthetically is more beautiful than what I expected. Slim and powerful is what I was looking for and this laptop fits perfectly in that description. Of course, the computer heats when under hard work, just as any other computer. People complaining about the computer are just too meticulous. I really recommend this computer if you are looking for a powerful, low-weight, slim gaming laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Leandro

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, I've had it for a month now and really no complaints. It runs beautifuly and I've never had a computer that starts up so fast. It exceeded my expectations in its performance. I use it for streaming, not gaming, so I've never had issues with the fans being loud. My only quarrel was with the packaging.. when i recieved the amazon box it was open which peeved me off and the computer box was damaged, but thats on amazon shipping more than the product so 5☆ to the product 0☆ to amazon packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda B

customer_reviews.title: A few months later and my son is still happy.
customer_reviews.text: My son is a play of League of Legions. This laptop was am upgrade from a mid-2012 Mac Book Pro. He reports that the game play is an order of magnitude better than the play on the Mac. While it did not have the absolute best video card, it appears to be more than enough. This unit did strike the right balance of performance and price. Con: It is bulky and heavy. More like a portable desktop. The battery life is not all that great.
customer_reviews.author: L. Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Runs Very Hot
customer_reviews.text: Speed of the laptop was great; however the heat even with the fans on max was very bad. the case was too hot to touch after 5 minutes of gaming right above the top row of keys. The top row of keys was unconfortable to use due to the heat The fans are very loud above 60%. Display is dark; most of the games i tried could not get bright enough.
customer_reviews.author: Chlorisaann

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bang for the buck. My first true gaming laptop as I step away from my ps4. The picture and sound on this laptop are outstanding. I downloaded some updated drivers and bios which was super easy. Very impressed with how much better this is than my old laptop and ps4. Cool looking, easy to use, great graphics and sound. Don't hesitate to pull the trigger on this, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H

customer_reviews.title: HDD cable
customer_reviews.text: HDD Caddy and cable is lost .A company that pays to put a cable on a computer that you're paying $ 1000 is really disgusting
customer_reviews.author: sefa mirac seven

customer_reviews.title: $900 and yet there are people giving it one star
customer_reviews.text: It's just funny, I don't know what they are expecting, you paid $900 for a 1060 6GB, 256GB SSD, 16GB RAM and I7-7700HQ. At this price range I guarantee there's no other laptops that have this great specs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Li

customer_reviews.title: As heavy as a gaming laptop and nothing else. Wasted Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a gaming laptop, please avoid this one. UNBELIEVABLE noisy when the cooling system is on. After 2 years, the laptop is a useless totally. Imagine, in 2019 AC , a gaming desktop cannot satisfy you when playing LOL... yes this is the one. I stopped playing PUBG with my friend because the bad cooling noisy and the ridiculous memory and CPU usage. Hey, I sometimes feel like my chrome can leak all the processor and memory. Anyway don't buy it. Stay away from Acer gaming. There are so many other choice: Alienware, ROG, Lenove, MSI... Just don;t choice this one. Wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Your honest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Seller sells defected items and then does not accept returns
customer_reviews.text: This laptop has had issues from the beginning when it would randomly shut down for no reason. Specifically if I launched the game it would definitely shut down. When I went to a service center, they confirmed after the inspection that the laptop has root issues with GPU being malfunctioning and replacing that GPU would cost me 300-400 USD and they could not guarantee that my laptop would be fixed even if that part was replaced. What I think is this seller sells refurbished or defected items which were not properly fixed.
customer_reviews.author: user-MGX18Y

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop, highly recommend giving it a look
customer_reviews.text: Bought this laptop to replace my old worn out gaming pc, compared it to many others with similar specs and this was just the best bang for the buck. Super fast boot up great performance. Only thing is I wish the screen got a little brighter but overall it's awesome. Acer did a great job with this laptop. Ran Witcher 3 on high settings at a locked 60fps. Have no concerns with any other games I want to play. Highly recommend this laptop to someone looking to play some great AAAvgames, but doesn't want to fork out $1500+.
customer_reviews.author: Blade

customer_reviews.title: Best Laptop I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: This is my first gaming laptop ever and I'm extremely happy with it I always wanted to own a gaming laptop but always thought they were way too pricey but thanks to Amazon Im able to pay it off monthly. While using steam to test it out i didn't have any lagging or overheating issues and was getting between 90 to 230 fps on certain games in ultra settings. 6 Months later update: Laptop is still running as good as new I ended getting a HTC Vive a few months after getting the laptop and the vive runs and plays smoothly. I've been able to play any vr game I've thrown at it my favorite at the moment is Pavlov
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a gaming laptop for years and finally bought this one. It is fantastic. I play Oculus Rift on it, It loads programs in a fraction of a second and is by far the best "computer" I have ever owned. Over a year and a half later and I am now using this laptop for everything (programming, gaming, and home entertainment system). It is running slightly slower but still powering everything I through at it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lester

customer_reviews.title: Built poorly
customer_reviews.text: The laptop did pretty well, for a while. For the first 2 months, I rarely used this laptop, so I had little issues out of it. However, once I started playing games on it regularly, I burned out two CPU fans within a months time - while using a cooling pad. The laptop isn’t able to filter heat very well. Currently I’m on my 3rd CPU fan, and honestly I just stopped using the laptop altogether. What’s the point, if I’m just going to have to order another $30 CPU fan by the end of the month? Could be a good laptop if you’re looking for moderate use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was highly rated. And, despite the issue, I would purchase through Amazon again because of their awesome customer service and willingness to fix my computer problem. Pros: Good Picture Keyboard lights up Cons: Did not work properly - programs would not open, would not see my hard drive. Four times with tech support.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Q.

customer_reviews.title: Well, this is an awesome gaming Laptop and cannot asked for more.
customer_reviews.text: Well, this is an awesome laptop and for what your paying for this unit is a steal! Here are the main reason: 1. My Class LAB for Unity and Unreal Engine 2. Test the games in beta 3. The Specs and the Nvidia videocard built in (I was contemplating on buying Nvidia 1080 TI ($700/each) and upgrade my gaming desktop) 4. This unit came with Acer Mixed VR Glasses (Black Friday Special) 5. You can bring your laptop anywhere along with the Acer MIXED VR Glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Alcantara

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a gaming laptop on a budget like I was then I highly recommend you get this
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this laptop along with the Seagate 2TB Firecuda SSHD while I was in the road so I can have some something to do in between loads (truck stops can only offer so much lol). After two days of setting up through updates of drivers, bios and protection programs, this thing is an absolute beast for it's price. It does get a little hot playing certain games on high to Max settings, but that's to be expected from a gaming laptop. The build quality is solid and doesn't feel cheap. If you're looking for a gaming laptop on a budget like I was then I highly recommend you get this. You won't find a better deal for the specs offered.
customer_reviews.author: Tremaine Campbell

customer_reviews.title: this is a good laptop to build on
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer to run mapping programs for geography. It runs ArcGIS really well and I haven't had any freezes or glitches with this system. For the moment, it's a decent portable system that will keep current with mapping software for the next few years, the laptop being upgradeable is also a perk for later on down the road. From what little I know, this is a good laptop to build on.
customer_reviews.author: Adat2574

customer_reviews.title: Great design, not the teenager design that it seemed to have when looking through videos and photos. Gorgeous performance.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome design, much better than what I was expecting by looking photos and videos. It seemed to be a teenager design laptop, but after looking it personally, actually it is a beautiful laptop. Everything working perfect, I've played some games and have watched some videos and everything is great. Not heating too much, not that 'yellow' screen that some customer have reported, and nothing to complain about the screen. Really great design and GORGEOUS PERFORMANCE.
customer_reviews.author: James Mallon

customer_reviews.title: Great for WoW
customer_reviews.text: This computer is an incredible price and runs so smoothly. I use it to play World of Warcraft and there is no lag or loss of definition in the graphics.
customer_reviews.author: Khaleesi, Mother of Dragons

customer_reviews.title: Durable, great value, fast
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this laptop. bought during cyber week in 2017 for I think $800? Installed a 2 TB HDD to supplement the much faster 256 GB SSD. Don't even have any games installed on it but it's very fast to boot up and they keyboard feels so comfortable on my hands. My only thing is that the numpad 0 is in the bottom middle instead of left so sometimes press wrong key >.< Overall very satisfied with it... but terrified it will get damaged somehow so keep it inside 2 cases most of the time
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming laptop for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great gaming laptop for the price. It comes with a package of 4 mounting screws if you want to install an additional HDD (which I strongly recommended). The laptop provides a bay for the additional HDD and the installation is very simply. To finish the process, all you may need is to evoke Windows Disk Management to make it recognizable by the OS.
customer_reviews.author: Alan S Lau

customer_reviews.title: Runs fast, graphics are smooth.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you essentially are paying for, I love this lap top and play quite often on it.Buy a cooling pad, does get hot. I do not have time to play all the time, but this works for what I bought it for. Be a shame to pass this deal up. Only downside is that it smudges easily and the fans are a bit loud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal for those looking for a gaming laptop.
customer_reviews.text: It's a really powerful laptop for the price. You can expand the storage space and memory relatively easy too. After my alienware died on me through some not so scrupulous practices by Dell this has become my main PC for gaming. It can handle anything within reason at 1080p, the battery life is ok but I would not recommend playing a game while its unplugged.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

product_meta.title: Acer Predator Helios 300 Gaming Laptop, 15.6" Full HD IPS, Intel i7 CPU, 16GB DDR4 RAM, 256GB SSD, GeForce GTX 1060-6GB, VR Ready, Red Backlit KB, Metal Chassis, Windows 10 64-bit, G3-571-77QK
product_meta.description: Style:LaptopAcer Predator Helios 300 G3-571-77QK Gaming Notebook comes with these high level specs: 7th Generation Intel Core i7 Processor 2.8GHz with Turbo Boost Technology up to 3.8GHz, 15.6" Full HD (1920 x 1080) widescreen LED-backlit IPS display, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 with 6 GB of dedicated GDDR5 VRAM, 16GB DDR4 2400MHz Memory, 256GB SSD, Acer TrueHarmony Technology Sound System, Two Built-in Stereo Speakers, Secure Digital (SD) card reader, 802.11ac WiFi featuring 2x2 MIMO technology (Dual-Band 2.4GHz and 5GHz), Bluetooth 4.0, 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet LAN (RJ-45 port), HD Webcam (1280 x 720) supporting High Dynamic Range (HDR), 1 - USB 3.1 (Type C) port (Gen 1 up to 5 Gbps), 1 - USB 3.0 Port (featuring Power-off Charging), 2 - USB 2.0 Ports, 1 - HDMI 2.0 Port with HDCP Support, 4-cell Li-ion Battery (3220 mAh), Up to 7-hours Battery Life, 5.95 lbs. | 2.7 kg (system unit only) (NH.Q28AA.001)
feature_bullets: Latest 7th Generation Intel Core i7 Processor 2.8GHz with Turbo Boost Technology up to 3.8GHz | Windows 10 Home 64-bit
Latest NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 with 6 GB of dedicated GDDR5 VRAM
15.6" Full HD (1920 x 1080) widescreen IPS display, Red Backlit Keyboard
16GB DDR4 DRAM Memory & 256GB SSD | Extra empty expandable hard drive slot for 2.5" hard drives
